translation:
In the capacity of Chief Colonel of the Legion of National Guards of this District and duly authorized by His Excellency Sir Captain Francisco Xavier, Commander of the forces besieging the town of São José do Norte, in order to not only prevent the enemies from seizing them, but also to supply our divisions with such article, should it be necessary.

2. — To all persons who take said ponchos, Sir Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro is to send this to His Excellency Sir Bento Gonçalves da Silva. From now on, may you remain, Sir.
